articles.title: CDC: Flu activity at lowest since 2005 - KOAT New Mexico
articles.description: The CDC said it is possible COVID-19 mitigation efforts have kept the virus at bay this season.
articles.content:
ATLANTA —According to new data from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, flu activity is at its lowest in the last decade.
